newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela Banco Provincial goes universal.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela Banco Provincial goes universal.

text.p: Venezuela's Emergency Financial Board (JEF) approved Tuesday the conversion of Venezuela's largest bank, Banco Provincial, into a universal bank, the official gazette which records all Venezuelan legislation showed.

The move, which still requires approval from the Banking Superintendency, will see Banco Provincial fuse with its subsidiaries investment bank Provincial Banco de Inversion, leasing company Arrendadora Provincial, and fund manager Fondo Provincial de Activos Liquidos.
